Package com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen

Class MessengerScreen

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen.gui.InputWidget
com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen.gui.Container
com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen.Screen
com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen.MessengerScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiElement, StaticWidget
public class MessengerScreen extends Screen
Messenger screen, a screen that shows a message that can change. Useful for loading something like a dimension or a world.
Since:
0.0.0

    • render

      public void render(BubbleBlaster game, Renderer renderer, float partialTicks)
      Renders the environment loading scene.
      Shows the title in the blue accent color (#00b0ff), and the description in a 50% black color (#7f7f7f).
      Overrides:
      render in class Screen
      Parameters:
      game - the game launched.
      renderer - the graphics 2D processor.
      partialTicks - game frame time.
